snippet.title: Terroir Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Terroir is a winemaking tycoon and management game that puts you in charge of your own vineyard. You grow different varieties of grapes, craft wine, expand your estate, take on missions and join wine awards, all in a bid to expand your winemaking empire. The game features beautiful low-poly and hand-illustrated 2D graphics, as well as an original soundtrack composed and performed by the CLARQuinet ensemble of Singapore.

The game is available from the 20th of September, 2017.
Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/559910/Terroir/
Humble Bundle: https://www.humblebundle.com/store/terroir
Official Website: http://www.generalinteractive.co/
Twitter: www.twitter.com/genintco
Facebook: www.facebook.com/genintco
Reddit: www.reddit.com/r/terroir
